005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
009
010import java.time.temporal.TemporalAmount;
011
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
013
014public interface IDurationItem extends IAnyAtomicItem {
015  /**
016   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
017   *
018   * @param item
019   *          the item to cast
020   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
021   *         cast to this type
022   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
023   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
024   */
025  @NonNull
026  static IDurationItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
027    IDurationItem retval;
028    if (item instanceof IDurationItem) {
029      retval = (IDurationItem) item;
030    } else {
031      try {
032        retval = IDayTimeDurationItem.valueOf(item.asString());
033      } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
034        try {
035          retval = IYearMonthDurationItem.valueOf(item.asString());
036        } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex2) {
037          InvalidValueForCastFunctionException newEx = new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(ex2);
038          newEx.addSuppressed(ex);
039          throw newEx; // NOPMD context as suppressed
040        }
041      }
042    }
043    return retval;
044  }
045
046  @Override
047  TemporalAmount getValue();
048
049  @Override
050  default IDurationItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
051    return cast(item);
052  }
053}
